t: Uncaged Ergonomics – UncagedErgonomics
s: Uncaged Ergonomics specializes in creating unique, useful and affordable ergonomic office furniture. We design most products in-house starting with a hand-drawn concept before moving to CAD renderings, prototyping, 3Dprinting, sourcing raw materials and eventually making molds for mass production.
